title: Morning Joe 3/31/21
description: President Biden's overall approval rating is at 52 percent in new polling, and while 65 percent approve of his handling of the coronavirus, only 34 percent approve of his handling of the border crisis.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: President Biden's overall approval rating is at 52 percent in new polling, and while 65 percent approve of his handling of the coronavirus, only 34 percent approve of his handling of the border crisis.
